transaction package¶

Submodules¶

transaction.transaction module¶

class transaction.transaction.transaction[source]¶

Bases: object

The transaction abstract class defines methods that may be implemented by an Account class

abstract getBalance()[source]¶

Return the current balance of this acccount

abstract isEmpty()[source]¶

Checks if the balance for this account is zero and returns True if the balance is zero, else returns False.

abstract credit(amount: float)[source]¶

Increases the balance of this account by the specified amount.

Args:

amount (float): the amount to increase the balance by

abstract debit(amount: float)[source]¶

Decreases the balance of this account by the specified amount.

Args:

amount (float): the amount to decrease the balance by
